attributes.name: Attachment
attributes.description: An uploaded file attached to an event.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: Unique identifier for the attachment

attributes.name: content_type
attributes.description: MIME type of the attachment

attributes.name: created_at
attributes.description: UTC time at which the attachment was created

attributes.name: description
attributes.description: Description of the attachment

attributes.name: file_size
attributes.description: File size in bytes

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: Set to the file name if not provided

attributes.name: updated_at
attributes.description: UTC time at which the attachment was updated

attributes.name: url
attributes.description: Path to where the attachment is stored

attributes.name: event
attributes.description: include associated event

attributes.name: content_type
attributes.description: prefix with a hyphen (-content_type) to reverse the order

attributes.name: created_at
attributes.description: prefix with a hyphen (-created_at) to reverse the order

attributes.name: description
attributes.description: prefix with a hyphen (-description) to reverse the order

attributes.name: file_size
attributes.description: prefix with a hyphen (-file_size) to reverse the order

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: prefix with a hyphen (-name) to reverse the order

attributes.name: updated_at
attributes.description: prefix with a hyphen (-updated_at) to reverse the order

attributes.name: content_type
attributes.description: query on a specific content_type

attributes.name: created_at
attributes.description: query on a specific created_at

attributes.name: description
attributes.description: query on a specific description

attributes.name: file_size
attributes.description: query on a specific file_size

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: query on a specific name

attributes.name: updated_at
attributes.description: query on a specific updated_at

attributes.name: per_page
attributes.description: how many records to return per page (min=1, max=100, default=25)

attributes.name: offset
attributes.description: get results from given offset
